content.text: Match ends, Almería 2, Huesca 1.

Rafita (Almería) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt saved. Henok Goitom (Almería) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Fernando Soriano with a headed pass.
Hand ball by Fernando Soriano (Almería).
